summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3588 , for the improvement of East Marginal Way, from Dawson Street to Fidalgo Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by trunk sewers, subsewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44266 , and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
